name: Brave Dungeon II
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Brave Dungeon II - a great continuation of an adventure game in the genre of Roguelike.
As in the first part - a lot of useful items to restore health and mana, a variety of traps and hordes of enemies.
Embark on a long journey through the incredible, very dangerous and simply require great courage dungeons!
Fight with rebel ghosts and a horde of bats! Pump over your skills and take away all the wealth!

Funny bagel made in the pixel retro style, with the support of the Russian language and the random generation of content - after the death of the character
levels and their components are generated.
Each passage will not be like the previous one, full replayability is provided to you!
You are waiting for exciting adventures!

★ Simple and beautiful graphics
★ Swift gameplay
★ Classic bagel
★ Retro style
★ Different magic
★ Original Soundtrack
